summary: The forbidden education (Spanish title La Educación Prohibida) is an independent film released in 2012. It describes a variety of alternative education practices and unconventional schools ... See full summary »
cast: Santiago Magariños|Amira Adre|Nicolás Valenzuela|Gastón Pauls|Alejandra Figueroa|Jimena Del Pozo|Jota David Ojeda|Eliana Grosso|Victoria Larriveu|Teresa Gioia|Tulio Gomez Alzaga|Sandro Molfesa|María del Carmen Antelo|Marina Groshaus|Nancy Encinas|Marisa Veiga López|Patricia Lomónaco|Ezequiel Ábila|Juan Facundo Licera Merli|Jorge Garibotto|Adriel Defelice|Carlos Caparulo|Ailín Malén|Octavio Alcoba|Edwina Avogadro|Merlina Avogadro|Macarena Sol Bieniauskas|Iván Cremata|Facundo Daskal|Mateo Daskal|Lara de Rosa|Máximo del Priore|Carolina Dorso|Martín Gil|Gabriel González|Paula González|Sofía Gruchesky|Paine Vische Lucka|Maximiliano Marrero|Brenda Mele|Luca Mele|Julián Oddone|Santiago Palmieri|Agustina Peralta|Malena Pierotti|Sofia Pierotti|Daniela Poczymok|Santiago Pérez|Juan Cruz Rimoldi|Carola Santoro|Eugenia Saraseni|Lola Sfriso|Matteo Sfriso|Michelle Trajtenberg|Isabella Viviano
title: La educación prohibida
